import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { assets } from '../../assets/assets' import './food.css' import { StoreContext } from '../../context/StoreContext' const Food_Item = ({id,name,price,description,image}) => { const {cartItems,addToCart,removeFromCart,url}=useContext(StoreContext) return (
{ !cartItems[id]?addToCart(id)} src={assets.add_icon_white} alt=""/>:
removeFromCart(id)} src={assets.remove_icon_red} alt=""/>

{cartItems[id]}

addToCart(id)} src={assets.add_icon_green} alt="" />
}

{name}

{description}

${ price}

) } export default Food_Item
